com.algolia.search.saas

Class OfflineClient

  • Object
    • com.algolia.search.saas.AbstractClient
      • com.algolia.search.saas.Client
        • com.algolia.search.saas.OfflineClient

  • public class OfflineClient
extends Client

    An API client that adds offline features on top of the regular online API client.

    NOTE: Requires Algolia's SDK. The enableOfflineMode(String) method must be called with a valid license key prior to calling any offline-related method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.algolia.search.saas.Client

        Client.MultipleQueriesStrategy

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.algolia.search.saas.AbstractClient

        AbstractClient.LibraryVersion

      • OfflineClient

        public OfflineClient(@NonNull
                     android.content.Context context,
                     @NonNull
                     String applicationID,
                     @NonNull
                     String apiKey,
                     File dataDir)

        Construct a new offline-enabled API client.

        Parameters:
        context - An Android context.
        applicationID - See Client.
        apiKey - See Client.
        dataDir - Path to the directory where the local data will be stored. If null, the default directory will be used. See getDefaultDataDir().

        apiKey - See Client.
        dataDir - Path to the directory where the local data will be stored. If null, the default directory will be used. See getDefaultDataDir().
        hosts - See Client.

    • Method Detail

      • initIndex

        public MirroredIndex initIndex(@NonNull
                               String indexName)
        Deprecated. You should now use getIndex(String), which re-uses instances with the same name.

        Create a new index. Although this will always be an instance of MirroredIndex, mirroring is deactivated by default.

        Overrides:
        initIndex in class Client
        Parameters:
        indexName - the name of index
        Returns:
        The newly created index.

      • getIndex

        @NonNull
public MirroredIndex getIndex(@NonNull
                                       String indexName)

        Obtain a mirrored index. Although this will always be an instance of MirroredIndex, mirroring is deactivated by default.

        Overrides:
        getIndex in class Client
        Parameters:
        indexName - The name of the index.
        Returns:
        A proxy to the specified index.

        Warning: The name should not overlap with any OfflineIndex. See getOfflineIndex(String).

      • getOfflineIndex

        public OfflineIndex getOfflineIndex(@NonNull
                                    String indexName)

        Obtain a purely offline index.

        Parameters:
        indexName - The name of the index.
        Returns:
        A proxy to the specified index.

        Warning: The name should not overlap with any MirroredIndex. See getIndex(String).

      • getRootDataDir

public File getRootDataDir()

        Get the path to directory where the local data is stored.

        public void enableOfflineMode(@NonNull
                              String licenseData)

        Enable the offline mode.

        Parameters:
        licenseData - License for Algolia’s SDK.

      • getDefaultDataDir

        public File getDefaultDataDir()

        Get the default data directory. This is an “algolia” subdirectory inside the application’s files directory.

        Returns:
        The default data directory.

      • getContext

        @NonNull
public android.content.Context getContext()

      • hasOfflineData

        public boolean hasOfflineData(@NonNull
                              String name)

        Test if an index has offline data on disk.

        Note: This applies both to MirroredIndex and OfflineIndex instances.

        Warning: This method is synchronous!

        Parameters:
        name - The index’s name.
        Returns:
        true if data exists on disk for this index, false otherwise.

      • listIndexesOfflineAsync

        public Request listIndexesOfflineAsync(@NonNull
                                       CompletionHandler completionHandler)

        List existing offline indices. Only indices that actually exist on disk are listed. If an instance was created but never synced or written to, it will not appear in the list.

        Note: This applies both to MirroredIndex and OfflineIndex instances.

        Parameters:
        completionHandler - The listener that will be notified of the request’s outcome.
        Returns:
        A cancellable request.

      • deleteIndexOfflineAsync

        public Request deleteIndexOfflineAsync(@NonNull
                                       String indexName,
                                       CompletionHandler completionHandler)

        Delete an offline index. This deletes the data on disk. If the index does not exist, this method does nothing.

        Note: This applies both to MirroredIndex and OfflineIndex instances.

        Parameters:
        indexName - Name of index to delete.
        Returns:
        A JSON object.

      • moveIndexOfflineAsync

        public Request moveIndexOfflineAsync(@NonNull
                                     String srcIndexName,
                                     @NonNull
                                     String dstIndexName,
                                     CompletionHandler completionHandler)

        Move an existing offline index.

        Warning: This will overwrite the destination index if it exists.

        Note: This applies both to MirroredIndex and OfflineIndex instances.

        Parameters:
        srcIndexName - Name of index to move.
        dstIndexName - The new index name.
        completionHandler - The listener that will be notified of the request’s outcome.
        Returns:
        A cancellable request.
